actions.description: Upload a file to the FTP server

directoryName.labelHint: FTP directory name in which to upload file

fileExist.labelHint: Desired behavior when the file being uploaded is already on the server

fileName.labelHint: Simple language expression that resolves to a file name

actions.name: Upload

actions.description: Download a file from the FTP server

delay.displayName: Time interval before the next poll
delay.labelHint: Wait this amount of time between polls

delete.labelHint: Delete the file from the server after downloading it

directoryName.labelHint: FTP directory name from which to download file

fileName.labelHint: Simple language expression that resolves to a file name

initialDelay.labelHint: Wait amount of time before starting to poll

actions.name: Download

binary.labelHint: Indicate whether file transfer mode is binary

connectTimeout.labelHint: Maximum number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established

disconnect.labelHint: Disconnect from the server after performing the action

host.labelHint: Host name of the FTP server to connect to

maximumReconnectAttempts.labelHint: Try to reconnect no more than this many times

passiveMode.labelHint: Indicates whether passive connection mode is being used

password.labelHint: Password for connecting to the FTP server

reconnectDelay.labelHint: Number of milliseconds to wait before trying to reconnect

timeout.labelHint: Maximum number of milliseconds to wait for a reply

username.labelHint: User name for connecting to the FTP server

actions.description: Start an integration from a Webhook

contextPath.description: The Webhook token that will be set as final part of the URL

actions.name: Incoming Webhook

connector.description: Create direct connections with external systems through Webhooks
connector.name: Webhook
